interactions.name: Toggle Sidebar
interactions.description: Expand or collapse the sidebar

interactions.name: Toggle Theme
interactions.description: Switch between light and dark theme

interactions.name: Set Selected Contact Type to Clients
interactions.description: Updates the selectedContactType variable to 'Clients'

interactions.name: Set Selected Contact Type to Suppliers
interactions.description: Updates the selectedContactType variable to 'Suppliers'

color.code: const type = context.item.data.type; if (type === 'Client') return '#1E40AF'; if (type === 'Subcontractor') return '#047857'; if (type === 'Supplier') return '#B45309'; return '#6D28D9';

backgroundColor.code: const type = context.item.data.type; if (type === 'Client') return '#EBF5FF'; if (type === 'Subcontractor') return '#F0FDF4'; if (type === 'Supplier') return '#FEF3C7'; return '#F3E8FF';

backgroundColor.code: const type = context.item.data.type; if (type === 'Client') return '#EBF5FF'; if (type === 'Subcontractor') return '#F0FDF4'; if (type === 'Supplier') return '#FEF3C7'; return '#F3E8FF';
